job description:
Senior Research Scientist
If you are a Senior Research Scientist with experience, please read on!
What You Will Be Doing
You will be responsible for doing independent and collaborative scientific research to solve new challenges in face-related projects.

Main tasks
Doing independent research on one of these topics: gaze estimation, driver drowsiness detection, driver behavior analysis, in-car human pose estimation
Doing research under the guidance on selected topics, including face liveness detection, face ID, 3D facial landmark point estimation, 3D face mesh reconstruction, facial expression recognition, etc.
Developing new solutions and write patent disclosure if needed
Guiding software engineer in algorithm optimization and platform integration
Following related technology advancement and discover new applications that can leverage our expertise
What You Need for this Position
Experience and knowledge of:

PhD degree in CS/EE or related major
Familiarity with computer vision, machine learning and deep learning is a must
Independent thinking and problem-solving skills are required
Prior experience with face detection, verification, head pose and gaze estimation, action/behavior analysis, driver drowsiness detection is very much desired
Programming experience in C/C++, Python, Java
Familiar with deep learning framework such as caffe, tensorflow, PyTorch, etc.
Familiar with embedded platform/system
Teamwork and collaboration with co-workers
So, if you are a Senior Research Scientist with experience, please apply today! ---If interested please apply or send resume AND salary requirements to Chelsea.Anderson@cybercoders.com ---
